title: Sound On: Global Tax Overhaul, Jobs Reaction (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Global Tax Overhaul, Jobs Reaction (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guest hosts Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick were joined by Ranking member of House Ways and Means Committee, Kevin Brady of Texas, Adam Green, co-founder of the Progressive Change Campaign Committee, and Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
